name: Ant Commander (catslikeclouds)
description:
Match the tiles by colour, shape, or number to build up your colony. Then send your ants out and see what food they bring back! Click the dice to reroll your tiles if you're stuck.

Made for the Develop to Help jam, April 2022. Wanted to do a lot more with this but only had about 3 days of work in me unfortunately. Still, glad to take part!

FULL RULES:
- Select a starting tile from the 3 in front of you
- The timer starts now. Click on a new tile that matches the last one you clicked, either in colour, shape, or by how many ants are on it.
- You can reroll your 3 tiles by clicking the dice
- Points are scored by how many ants you can gather, 1 for each one printed on the tiles you select
- Clicking tiles that don't match will incur a time penalty, as does rerolling all the tiles
- Look out for special tiles that show up just below the main 3! These contain bonuses
- No I did not have time to make a tutorial in the game itself....
